componentInstanceProperties.value:
Highlights

VentureCrowd is raising $10.5M in tranches to fast-track key growth initiatives, including the development of the next phase of its technology platform and expanding into Southeast Asia.

Investors are offered the opportunity to invest in preference equity issued by VentureCrowd Services Australia - VentureCrowd’s shared corporate services entity - through an investment in VentureCrowd Trust No.0665 (VentureCrowd Services Australia) (Fund).

  • $238,000,000+ raised-to-date, forecasting a 129% YoY increase in FY22
  • 67,000+ registered members, forecasting a 95% YoY growth in total distributions to investors in FY22
  • Forecasting a 47% YoY revenue increase in FY22.

Invest in Preferred Equity at a target return of 15% p.a. and join VentureCrowd's global expansion.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Multi-asset Digital Investment Platform

At VentureCrowd, we have developed and created a vertically integrated, full service alternative asset platform and products business that can raise funds from investors for venture and property opportunities, develop complex property projects, provide fund administration and undertake marketing and sales activities. This vertical integration maximises revenue generation from all activities and ensures optimal service delivery to our investors. Our end-to-end digital investment platform offers purpose-driven alternative assets to retail and wholesale investors.

Our product mix includes debt, equity and hybrid securities with differing risk-reward profiles in property and venture capital – previously only available to wholesale investors.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Property

VentureCrowd has built a full-scale property team based in Brisbane Australia that includes architects, engineers, developers and development managers with the ability to originate and manage end-to-end property development projects internally, generating proprietary property deal-flow for the platform. VentureCrowd’s property arm is a targeted differentiation strategy that ensures proprietary deal flow in a highly attractive alternative asset class and has been successful in driving investor registration and capital raising volumes.

Our team has the capability to undertake all aspects of the development process, from land sourcing, through to obtaining approvals, managing construction and the sale of off-the-plan dwellings. Once a development opportunity has been secured, VentureCrowd packages each part of the capital stack for the project separately and offers the opportunity to invest in that financial product to our 67,000+ members. Typically, this includes: pure equity in the initial phase of a project, the preference equity and/or mezzanine debt during the civil construction phase, and first mortgage loans in the construction phases of a project.

Once a financial product offering is closed, each financial product is managed by our funds management team under the relevant licence. This vertically integrated model is unique to VentureCrowd and allows the business to have complete control over all aspects of the delivery of both the financial product and the underlying asset.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: An example of one of our projects, a 49 dwelling residential estate complemented by unique riverfront community green space in Albany Creek, Queensland is below.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Ventures

VentureCrowd has its origins in venture capital. Founded by a former PwC venture capital partner and one of Australia’s leading venture capital ﬁrms, venture capital began as our core offering.

Our venture capital team includes technical specialists who have hands-on experience in venture capital deal structuring, negotiation, transaction documentation, funds administration, portfolio management and compliance.

This deep sector capability has allowed VentureCrowd to be the only such platform in Australia to have delivered 3 succesful venture capital exits.

Our team has extensive expertise in securing high quality deal ﬂow, which has resulted in a diverse portfolio of high-growth ventures such as:

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Partners

VentureCrowd has a strong network of partners that focus on curating impact investing opportunities and managing funds for seed stage and early stage ventures, as well as property funds and projects.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Recent Media

CEO, Steve Maarbani, chatted to AusBiz about completing a Series A $10 million raise that puts VentureCrowd on track for international expansion later this year.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Business News Australia: VentureCrowd's APAC Expansion 
  • The Australian: Investors Pile into $1 Billion Crowdfunding Boom

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Success Stories

At VentureCrowd we don't just list anything on our platform. Our rigurous curation process means that only a small percentage of our reviewed investment opportunities are considered for capital raise through our platform.

As a result, VentureCrowd is the only equity crowdfunding platform to have delivered multiple successful venture capital exits.

Our team focuses on providing only highly vetted investment opportunities and we have a loyal base of repeat investors backing our curate deals.

Here is a brief snapshot of some of the recent and past deals that we're proud of (with many more not listed here):

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Our Industries in Focus

We provide access to a wide range of asset classes and with a key focus on high growth industry sectors, such as:

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Property

For investors, the next few years are creating an opportunity for solid gains in the property market without any obvious signs of the heat in the market easing. VentureCrowd is particularly bullish on the regional property market. Driven by affordability, lifestyle, and work flexibility, regional property prices have on average climbed 15.2% (versus 9.4% in capital cities) over the past 12 months. VentureCrowd raises capital for property development projects and will participate in the capital stack from equity through to mezzanine debt, depending on the project.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
HealthTech, MedTech & BioTech

Technology is democratising access to healthcare, enabling a change in mindset that places greater focus on a healthier lifestyle rather than on the current emphasis on treatment and aftercare. This puts the consumer at the centre of health innovation. Forecasts indicate the global digital health market will continue to grow at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of over 15% p.a. to reach USD 258 billion by 2028. This space will continue to be catalysed by the global consumer need for hyper-convenience and personalisation, driving the need to improve healthcare accessibility, quality and safety through technology.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
FoodTech

The increasing focus from consumers on nutrition, health and sustainability, and the failure of industry incumbents to adequately address those needs, is driving a rapid rise in FoodTech innovation, with startups filling the gaps left by incumbents. In 2020, global FoodTech startups raised an estimated USD 26 billion, which represents a 35% increase on the year before. The COVID-19 pandemic has further increased investment across all segments, with no signs of slowing. In fact, the global FoodTech market is currently forecast to grow to USD 346 billion by 2027 at a CAGR of 6.0%. It’s clear that FoodTech is no longer an early-stage industry but very much a new growth sector and one VentureCrowd follows closely.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Renewables

We’re passionate about giving our community the ability to invest and shape the world in which we live. That’s why at VentureCrowd we work hard to curate investment opportunities that are good for investors and the planet. In 2020 it was estimated that the impact investing market accounts for USD 715 billion in assets under management globally. Clearly, sustainability is top of mind when it comes to seeking financial returns, and we aim to continue to position ourselves as leaders in this space.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Our Market

Once considered fringe, investing in venture capital and property development is becoming mainstream all over the world, as digital access opens the sector to the next generation of retail and wholesale investors chasing high growth purpose-driven opportunities.

According to PwC, alternative assets are expected to boom over the next few years with assets under management forecast to grow from USD 2.9 trillion in 2017 to USD 6.9 trillion by 2025, a CAGR of 11.7%.

VentureCrowd is leading this counterculture as the only digital investment platform for purpose-driven alternative assets open to retail and wholesale investors anytime, anywhere.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Business Overview

VentureCrowd has developed a vertically integrated, full service alternative asset platform and products business that can raise funds from investors for venture capital and property opportunities, develop and distribute complex projects, provide fund administration services and undertake marketing and sales activities.

This vertical integration maximises revenue generation from our activities. Our end-to-end digital investment platform offers purpose-driven alternative assets to retail and wholesale investors. Our product mix includes debt, equity and hybrid securities with differing risk-reward profiles in property and venture capital – previously only available to wholesale investors.

Our corporate structure, inclusive of entities facilitating our diverse range of operations, allows us to undertake a breadth of services for ventures, property, and funds opportunities.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The platform has been built, and continues to develop, to adapt and evolve with the changing demands of clients, devices, products and personalisation, and to allow a seamless rollout into Asia (or other foreign markets) in due course.

As a platform, it is low risk, with the customisation around investor experience being predominantly built within the Salesforce environment and the applications based functionality completing the technology stack to provide a secure community.

﻿Hear it from our investors:

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Management Team

VentureCrowd is driven by a passionate, talented and purpose-driven group of people working hard to find and fund a better future.

Our multidisciplinary expertise enables us to be the only multi-asset digital platform for alternative assets in Australia. Our teams have deep expertise in venture capital, investor relations, funds management, compliance and technology.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Fund

VentureCrowd Trust No. 0665 (VentureCrowd Services Australia) (Fund) is structured as an unregistered wholesale unit trust, the trustee of which is VentureCrowd Nominees Pty Ltd (ACN 166 599 140). Investors will acquire Units in the Fund at an issue price of $1.00 per Unit.

The Trustee will issue Units to investors in its capacity as an authorised representative of VentureCrowd Pty Ltd (ACN 166 598 849) under Australian Financial Services License No.503381.

The Fund will acquire preference shares in VentureCrowd Services Australia Pty Ltd (ACN 638 909 878), the entity that provides shared corporate services to the entities within the VentureCrowd Group.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Fees & Expenses

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Risks

Whilst the directors of VentureCrowd are experienced business managers with deep experience in the key areas that are core to the operation of this business, there are always risks associated with investing in venture capital opportunities which may, either directly or indirectly, result in reduced distributions and/or a loss of some of the capital value of an investment in the Fund. Before deciding whether to subscribe for Units, you should consider whether an investment in this Fund is suitable for you and obtain professional advice.
